*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, October 8, 1832. Concerning selection of lots in Matagorda.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Hoit*/person_mentioned* informs me that you wish me to instruct you where I wish the blocks located that I shall be entitled to take in *location_mentioned*Matagorda*/location_mentioned* I have not time to go there, and must request that you will locate them for me— I shall be satisfied with your selection, I want nothing but a fair chance with the rest.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-08-1832">Oct. 8. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr E Wightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr. E. R. Wightman */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Matagorda*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
